game.name: The Headliners
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 협동 공포 게임으로, 1~8명의 기자 팀이 되어 치명적인 괴물로 가득 찬 뉴욕을 탐험하며 멋진 사진을 찍는 것이 목표입니다. 당신의 유일한 목표: 헤드라인에 오르는 것... 그리고 살아남아 그것을 직접 읽는 것.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Co-op horror game where you play in teams of 1 to 8 reckless journalists, ready to explore a city overrun by deadly creatures to snap spectacular footage. Your only goal: make the headlines without becoming one.

reviewHighlights.text: I don't normally write reviews but... No co-op centered game has been more fun to return to than The Headliners. The devs are always adding things to...
This game is inaccurate Ain't no journalist gonna get paid for spreading truthful news WE MISINFORM IN THIS BUSINESS
